scripts.copy-assets:linux:darwin: rimraf build && cp -R ./node_modules/@kie-tools/kogito-swf-common/resources build && cp -R resources/* build
scripts.image:build:darwin:win32: echo "Build skipped on macOS and Windows"
scripts.image:test:darwin:win32: echo "Tests skipped on macOS and Windows"
scripts.image:test:linux: pnpm copy-test-assets && pnpm setup:env make -C ./build test-image
scripts.setup:env: . ./node_modules/@kie-tools/python-venv/venv/bin/activate && cross-env SWF_IMAGE_REGISTRY=$(build-env kogitoSwfDevMode.registry) SWF_IMAGE_REGISTRY_ACCOUNT=$(build-env kogitoSwfDevMode.account) SWF_IMAGE_NAME=$(build-env kogitoSwfDevMode.name) SWF_IMAGE_TAG=$(build-env kogitoSwfDevMode.tag) QUARKUS_PLATFORM_VERSION=$(build-env quarkusPlatform.version) KOGITO_VERSION=$(build-env kogitoRuntime.version)
